messages.subject: Email worm
messages.msgSnippet: I tried to open one of these attachments but, for whatever reason, I could not find any of the files in my hard drive.  It may be possible to avoid
messages.messageBody:
I tried to open one of these attachments but, for whatever reason, I
could not find any of the files in my hard drive. It may be possible to
avoid contamination even if you've opened one.

I don't recall seeing this web site being posted here so I thought I
would for those who may need it. I know a couple of folks who contracted
it and their computers crashed, most others have been able to delete the
files and are operating fine.


http://www.symantec.com/avcenter/venc/data/w32.badtrans.13312@...

The give step-by-step instructions for detection and removal.

Kris
